Test Piece Contest
Il Flauto Magico [unknown arranger]
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £40 and cup, 2nd £30, 3rd £15, 4th £5. March contest - 1st Horden, 2nd Colne. 3 bands competed.
